casebody.data:
HYMAN et al., Respondents, v. SCHMIDT, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. January 8, 1894.) •Action by Rose Hyman and another against Sigmund A. Schmidt.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

J. C. Rosenbaum, for appellant. C. Meyers, for respondents.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs. See 19 N. Y. Supp. 215.
